Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, and Broadway: due to, parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, Broadway and over the regular route, due to parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Foster
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark: due to, parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route due to a parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable on the Brown and Red lines due to a network problem. Train service is unaffected. Engineers working to correct.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Information in CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable on the Brown and Red lines due to a network problem.

Engineers are working to correct the problem and we appreciate your patience.

Service is unaffected.
